history.proof: intros f v Hin. unfold freeVarFormula in *. simpl in Hin. shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (f : fol.Formula LNN) (v : nat), In v (freeVarFormula LNT (LNN2LNT_formula f)) -> In v (freeVarFormula LNN f)

Premises:
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
Module fol := Struct Record Language : Type := language { Relations : Set; Functions : Set; arity : Relations + Functions -> nat } Definition Relations : Language -> Set. Definition Functions : Language -> Set. Definition arity : forall l : Language, Relations l + Functions l -> nat. Inductive Term (L : Language) : Set := var : nat -> Term L | apply : forall f : Functions L, Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> Term L with Terms (L : Language) : nat -> Set := Tnil : Terms L 0 | Tcons : forall n : nat, Term L -> Terms L n -> Terms L (S n) Definition Term_rect : forall (L : Language) (P : Term L -> Type), (forall n : nat, P (var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P (apply L f0 t)) -> forall t : Term L,
Formula = fol.Formula LNT : Set
LNN2LNT_formula = fix LNN2LNT_formula (f : fol.Formula LNN) : Formula := match f with | @fol.equal _ t1 t2 => equal (LNN2LNT_term t1) (LNN2LNT_term t2) | @atomic _ r ts => match r as l return (fol.Terms LNN (arity LNN (inl l)) -> Formula) with | LT => fun t0 : fol.Terms LNN (arity LNN (inl LT)) => translateLT t0 end ts | @fol.impH _ A B => impH (LNN2LNT_formula A) (LNN2LNT_formula B) | @fol.notH _ A => notH (LNN2LNT_formula A) | @fol.forallH _ v A => forallH v (LNN2LNT_formula A) end : fol.Formula LNN -> Formula
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
LNT = {| Relations := Datatypes.Empty_set; Functions := LNTFunction; arity := LNTArity |} : Language
LNN = {| Relations := LNNRelation; Functions := LNTFunction; arity := LNNArity |} : Language
freeVarFormula : forall L : Language, fol.Formula L -> list nat
LNN2LNT_freeVarFormula : forall (f : fol.Formula LNN) (v : nat), In v (freeVarFormula LNT (LNN2LNT_formula f)) < -> In v (freeVarFormula LNN f)
LNN.existSys : forall (T : LNN.System) (f g : LNN.Formula) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys LNN v T -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula LNN g) -> LNN.SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T f) g -> LNN.SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T (LNN.existH v f)) g
existSys : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys LNT v T -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula LNT g) -> SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNT) T f) g -> SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNT) T (existH v f)) g
freeVarSubFormula4 : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarFormula L (substituteFormula L f v s)) -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula L f) -> In x (freeVarFormula L f)
existE : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys LNT v T -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula LNT g) -> SysPrf T (existH v f) -> SysPrf T (impH f g) -> SysPrf T g
freeVarSubAllFormula2 : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (v n : nat), In n (freeVarFormula L f) -> In v (freeVarTerm L (m n)) -> In v (freeVarFormula L (subAllFormula L f m))
freeVarSubFormula2 : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerm L s) -> In v (freeVarFormula L f) -> In x (freeVarFormula L (substituteFormula L f v s))
LNN.existE : forall (T : LNN.System) (f g : LNN.Formula) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys LNN v T -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula LNN g) -> LNN.SysPrf T (LNN.existH v f) -> LNN.SysPrf T (LNN.impH f g) -> LNN.SysPrf T g
freeVarSubFormula1 : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), v <> x -> In x (freeVarFormula L f) -> In x (freeVarFormula L (substituteFormula L f v s))
freeVarSubFormula3 : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarFormula L (substituteFormula L f v s)) -> In x (list_remove nat Nat.eq_dec v (freeVarFormula L f)) \/ In x (freeVarTerm L s)
freeVarSubAllFormula1 : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (v : nat), In v (freeVarFormula L (subAllFormula L f m)) -> exists n : nat, In n (freeVarFormula L f) /\ In v (freeVarTerm L (m n))
In_freeVarListFormula : forall (L : Language) (v : nat) (f : fol.Formula L) (F : fol.Formulas L), In v (freeVarFormula L f) -> In f F -> In v (freeVarListFormula L F)
folLogic.existSys : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula L g) -> folProof.SysPrf L (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) T f) g -> folProof.SysPrf L (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) T (fol.existH L v f)) g
In_freeVarListFormulaE : forall (L : Language) (v : nat) (F : fol.Formulas L), In v (freeVarListFormula L F) -> exists f : fol.Formula L, In v (freeVarFormula L f) /\ In f F
freeVarClosedList2 : forall (L : Language) (l : list nat) (v : nat) (x : fol.Formula L), In v (freeVarFormula L (closeList L l x)) -> In v (freeVarFormula L x)
subFormulaNil : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (T : fol.System L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), ~ In v (freeVarFormula L f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (substituteFormula L f v s) f)
folLogic.existE : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula L g) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.existH L v f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L f g) -> folProof.SysPrf L T g
FA2 : forall (L : Language) (A : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), ~ In v (freeVarFormula L A) -> Prf L nil (fol.impH L A (fol.forallH L v A))
freeVarClosed : forall (L : Language) (x : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), ~ In v (freeVarFormula L (close L x))
freeVarClosedList1 : forall (L : Language) (l : list nat) (v : nat) (x : fol.Formula L), In v l -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula L (closeList L l x))
LNN2LNT_exist : forall (v : nat) (a : fol.Formula LNN), LNN2LNT_formula (fol.existH LNN v a) = existH v (LNN2LNT_formula a)
liftCloseFrom : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (f : fol.Formula L) (T : fol.System L) (m : nat), (forall v : nat, In v (freeVarFormula L f) -> v < m) -> n <= m -> folProof.SysPrf L T (closeFrom L 0 n f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (closeFrom L m n (subAllFormula L f (fun x : nat => if le_lt_dec n x then fol.var L x else fol.var L (m + x))))
subFormulaNTE : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (T : fol.System L), (forall (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), ~ In v (freeVarFormula L f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (substituteFormula L f v s) f)) /\ (forall (v1 v2 : nat) (s : fol.Term L), ~ In v2 (list_remove nat Nat.eq_dec v1 (freeVarFormula L f)) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (substituteFormula L (substituteFormula L f v1 (fol.var L v2)) v2 s) (substituteFormula L f v1 s))) /\ (forall (v1 v2 : nat) (s1 s2 : fol.Term L), v1 <> v2 -> ~ In v2 (freeVarTerm L s1) -> ~ In v1 (freeVarTerm L s2) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (substituteFormula L (...
subFormulaForall2 : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (x v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), exists nv : nat, ~ In nv (freeVarTerm L s) /\ nv <> v /\ ~ In nv (list_remove nat Nat.eq_dec x (freeVarFormula L f)) /\ substituteFormula L (fol.forallH L x f) v s = (if Nat.eq_dec x v then fol.forallH L x f else fol.forallH L nv (substituteFormula L (substituteFormula L f x (fol.var L nv)) v s))
subFormulaExist2 : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (x v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), exists nv : nat, ~ In nv (freeVarTerm L s) /\ nv <> v /\ ~ In nv (list_remove nat Nat.eq_dec x (freeVarFormula L f)) /\ substituteFormula L (fol.existH L x f) v s = (if Nat.eq_dec x v then fol.existH L x f else fol.existH L nv (substituteFormula L (substituteFormula L f x (fol.var L nv)) v s))
freeVarMap1 : forall (L : Language) (l : list nat) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (v n : nat), In v (freeVarTerm L (m n)) -> In n l -> In v (freeVarMap L l m)
rebindForall : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (a b : nat) (f : fol.Formula L), ~ In b (freeVarFormula L (fol.forallH L a f)) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (fol.forallH L a f) (fol.forallH L b (substituteFormula L f a (fol.var L b))))
rebindExist : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (a b : nat) (f : fol.Formula L), ~ In b (freeVarFormula L (fol.existH L a f)) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (fol.existH L a f) (fol.existH L b (substituteFormula L f a (fol.var L b))))
freeVarSubAllTerm2 : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (v n : nat), In n (freeVarTerm L t) -> In v (freeVarTerm L (m n)) -> In v (freeVarTerm L (subAllTerm L t m))
freeVarSubTerm2 : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerm L s) -> In v (freeVarTerm L t) -> In x (freeVarTerm L (substituteTerm L t v s))
freeVarSubTerm4 : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerm L (substituteTerm L t v s)) -> ~ In v (freeVarTerm L t) -> In x (freeVarTerm L t)
freeVarSubTerm1 : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerm L t) -> v <> x -> In x (freeVarTerm L (substituteTerm L t v s))
folLogic.forallI : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> folProof.SysPrf L T f -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.forallH L v f)
freeVarSubAllTerm1 : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (v : nat), In v (freeVarTerm L (subAllTerm L t m)) -> exists n : nat, In n (freeVarTerm L t) /\ In v (freeVarTerm L (m n))
freeVarSubAllTerms2 : forall (L : Language) (a : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L a) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (v n : nat), In n (freeVarTerms L a ts) -> In v (freeVarTerm L (m n)) -> In v (freeVarTerms L a (subAllTerms L a ts m))
subAllFormula_ext : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (m1 m2 : nat -> fol.Term L), (forall m : nat, In m (freeVarFormula L f) -> m1 m = m2 m) -> subAllFormula L f m1 = subAllFormula L f m2
freeVarSubTerms2 : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerm L s) -> In v (freeVarTerms L n ts) -> In x (freeVarTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v s))
folLogic.forallSimp : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.forallH L v f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T f
freeVarSubTerms4 : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v s)) -> ~ In v (freeVarTerms L n ts) -> In x (freeVarTerms L n ts)
LNN2LNT_term = fix LNN2LNT_term (t : fol.Term LNN) : Term := match t with | @fol.var _ v => var v | @apply _ f ts => apply LNT f (LNN2LNT_terms (arity LNN (inr f)) ts) end with LNN2LNT_terms (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms LNN n) {struct ts} : Terms n := match ts in (fol.Terms _ n0) return (Terms n0) with | @Tnil _ => Tnil LNT | @Tcons _ m s ss => Tcons LNT m (LNN2LNT_term s) (LNN2LNT_terms m ss) end for LNN2LNT_term : fol.Term LNN -> Term

```coq
intros f v Hin.
unfold freeVarFormula in *.
simpl in Hin.
auto.
Qed.
```

original: intros f v Hin. unfold freeVarFormula in *. simpl in Hin. auto.
